short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stand alongside Obanai Iguro and his serpent companion with captivating visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in the disciplined and mysterious world of Obanai Iguro with this captivating live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek interface inspired by Obanai’s serpentine elegance and stealthy presence, featuring dark green, black, and white tones accented by serpent motifs.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that complements Obanai’s composed and tactical nature.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Explore Demon Slayer-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as precise and agile as Obanai’s combat style.
